executive_orders.title: End Illegal Discrimination and Restore Merit-Based Opportunity
executive_orders.description: End illegal preferential treatment or discrimination in federal hiring, promotion, and funding. Restore fairness based on qualifications and merit.
actions: Stop identity-based preferences in recruitment, promotion, and funding
Ensure all agencies follow merit-based evaluations
Align policies with the Civil Rights Act of 1964
executive_orders.purpose: Restore merit-based equal opportunity in the federal government.

executive_orders.title: Terminate Radical and Wasteful Government DEI Programs
executive_orders.description: Critique and remove radical DEI programs that waste resources and promote ideological bias in federal agencies.
actions: Terminate DEI-related training, programs, and initiatives
Emphasize performance and merit as core management criteria
Require agencies to report program terminations
executive_orders.purpose: Eliminate unnecessary DEI programs and redirect focus to performance and ability.

executive_orders.title: Defend Women from Gender Ideology Extremism and Restore Biological Truth
executive_orders.description: Protect womenâ€™s rights in sports, education, and public spaces, maintaining clear distinctions between biological sex and gender identity.
actions: Mandate federal policies to distinguish biological sex from gender identity
Ensure equal opportunities and safety for women in all relevant areas
Ban funding or support for programs promoting gender ideology
executive_orders.purpose: Safeguard women's rights and uphold biological sex distinctions in federal policies.

executive_orders.title: Unleash American Energy
executive_orders.description: Remove restrictions on energy production, including oil, gas, and nuclear, to promote energy independence and economic growth.
actions: Cancel or modify regulations limiting energy development
Promote freer development of domestic energy resources
Streamline permitting processes for energy projects
executive_orders.purpose: Strengthen U.S. energy independence and boost economic growth.
